name: MATLAB Toolbox Package
summary: Learn about .MLTBX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MATLAB is specialized software primarily used by engineers and scientists that features a numerical computing environment and dedicated programming language. While the software comes with many features, you can add tools not packaged with the software via toolboxes. Examples of functionality include image-processing algorithms and mapping algorithms for illustrating geographic data as map displays.

You can access installed toolbox add-ons (MLTBX files) by selecting Add-Ons → Manage Add-Ons in the "HOME" tab. Additionally, to create an MLTBX file with MATLAB, select Add-Ons → Package Toolbox in the "HOME" tab, then click Package.

description: An MLTBX file is a toolbox add-on compressed with Zip compression that adds extra functionality to The MathWorks MATLAB, a programming and numeric computing program for analyzing data, developing algorithms, and building models. It stores all the information required by the add-on, including MATLAB .M and .MLX code files, .MLAPP application projects, and .XML settings files. MATLAB users export and import MLTBX files to share add-ons for the software.

instructions: You can open an MLTBX file with The MathWorks MATLAB. To open an MLTBX file, select Open from the "HOME" tab or double-click the file. You can also download and open Add-on MLTBX files via MATLAB by selecting Add-Ons → Get Add-Ons in the "HOME" tab.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .mltbx file in The MathWorks MATLAB R2023a
images.caption: MLTBX file open in The MathWorks MATLAB R2023a
